title: Scott McLaughlin is out of the Indy 500 , crashing in the warm - up lap at The Brickyard - the race is proceeding under caution due to rain - 26 - May - 2025
body_text:
News | Rugby League
14 Feb 2026 20:20
NZCity News
26 May 2025 - article from www.rugbyleague.co.nz
Lando Norris has won the Monaco Grand Prix - Liam Lawson has finished eighth for his first points of the season.
The last three Champions League places have been confirmed on the final day of the Premier League football season.
Chelsea, Manchester City and Newcastle have joined Liverpool and Arsenal in advancing to Europe at the expense of Aston Villa and Nottingham Forest.
The Warriors have been beaten 16-10 by the Raiders in round 12 NRL league action.
The Raiders move to second with 18 points, level with the third-placed Warriors - the Bulldogs lead on 20.
Lulu Sun has lost in straight sets in the first round of the French Tennis Open
Elsewhere, top women's seed Aryna Sabalenka is through, conceding one game.
The Tactix have beaten Magic 48-44 in Hamilton to temporarily go top of netball's ANZ Premiership, but the Mystics could overtake them with victory over the Steel tonight.
Golfer Kazuma Kobori has carded a one-under par final round to finish at five-under overall, eight strokes behind the winner in a share of 25th at the latest European Tour event in Belgium - he pockets 44-and-a-half thousand dollars in prize money.
Carlos Verona's won stage 15 of cycling's Giro d'Italia by 22 seconds - Isaac Del Toro leads by one minute 20 seconds overall with six legs remaining.
To cricket's Indian Premier League... Devon Conway's chalked his second half-century of the season in last-placed Chennai's 83-run victory over the competition-leading Gujarat in their final round robin games.
Conway added 52 off 35 balls to a score of 230 for five - the Super Kings bowled the Titans out for 147.
Sprinter Zoe Hobbs has finished fifth in the 100 metres with a time of 11.16 seconds at the latest Diamond League meet in Morocco.
Tom Walsh placed sixth in the shot put with a best heave of 21.41 metres, 56 centimetres behind the winner.
© 2026 Newstalk ZB, NZCity
